class_notes:
Target Audience: BBA Chartered Club Exec. Board Members. Permission is necessary to enroll in this course.  Please send a short email about your interest with your resume attached to Dr. Mitchell at demitc2@emory.edu by Thursday, August 26, 2021.


Class meets on Mondays from 5:30-7:30pm on the following dates: 9/13, 9/20, 10/4, 10/18, 10/25, alternate dates: 11/1, 11/8.  Alternate dates are only used if the instructor or the school has an emergency that causes one of the scheduled dates to be canceled (they will not be held as makeup dates for a missed class).  When signing up for a course, please remember to keep alternate dates free also.


The delivery format listed for this class is based on current university guidelines. However, if there are further changes to the COVID19 guidelines for Fall 2021 or other acts beyond our control, the school reserves the right the modify the delivery method for this class.
course_description: Senior seminar courses fall outside the scope of traditional academic coursework, and instead allow students to learn from and interact with experienced practitioners, and to develop industry-specific insights, fine-tune career skills, and increase professional exposure.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the BBA program.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 2670, Section #: 1102, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 5:30-7:30p, Instructor: A. Hershatter, Status: Closed
